column4: before install ubuntu 10.04 i get:  "unable to find a medium containing a live filesystem", md5 was checked. someone help me?
before install ubuntu 10.04 i get:  "unable to find a medium containing a live filesystem", md5 was checked. someone help me?
smells like a burning problem..  the live CD can also get corrupted by burning errors, bad CD, whatever..
try burning at half speed (of medium or burner, whichever is lower)
